description: Columbine (Aquilegia flabellata var. pumila 'Rosea') is an amazing plant species with stunning beauty. Its trumpet shaped, rose-hued blooms hang from tall, graceful stems with foliage resembling a unique combination of lacy fern and oak leaf. This plant is charmingly fragrant and adds a touch of whimsy and romance to any garden. It is deer-resistant, comes readily from seed, and blooms for long-lasting color in shady areas. Its petite size makes it ideal for small containers, rock gardens and edges of shady beds. This lovely columbine is low-maintenance, easy-to-grow, and a true delight to behold.
